subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Jeff Hafley, a native of Montvale, N.J., who spent the last five years as an assistant at Pittsburgh, most recently as the secondary coach, is moving to Rutgers, Coach Greg Schiano said.
snippet: Jeff Hafley, a native of Montvale, N.J., who spent the last five years as an assistant at Pittsburgh, most recently as the secondary coach, is moving to Rutgers, Coach Greg Schiano said.
